cause.description: Millions of animals die each year for human consumption. And Millions of them suffer each year is the most horrible conditions. We as human's are not supposed to eat meat. And if anyone thinks that's the only source of protein we can get is ingorant. Educate yourself. Humans and Animals may not be intellectually equal but we are emotionally the same and feel the same things. End animal suffering and end world hunger by eliminating meat from your diet.
cause.mission: Lead a more healthy lifestyle while savings millions of animals from suffering.
cause.name: Vegeterians and Vegans
